inn1.comm: clear signs of swing as Parthiv chips one off his pads to fine leg
outside off, good line, a bit of wobble through the air. Encouraging early signs for England
clipped firmly into the leg side. A bit of a chase from midwicket and Rahane is up and running
a fraction leg-sided, asking the ball to do too much, and clipped off the pads once again
solidly forward, blocked out to cover
back of a length, defended down into the crease. Good lift on that delivery
bustling delivery, lifting into the bat and tucked into the leg side
through to the keeper
on the pads again, England giving no width so far but a few freebies into the leg side
signs of swing from back of a length, but Parthiv sights it early and lets it go
speared out towards the tramlines, he's not getting away with that
blocked back down the track, and gathered in Bresnan's followthrough
solidly behind the line on off stump
outside off, poked to point and well snaffled with a dive
defended on the back foot, more subtle signs of swing
there's the one that nips the other way. Good bowling, but it was always going over the top as it rapped Rahane's pads, and there's no appeal
firmly forward to smother the outswing
nips into the right-hander, and is whipped off the hip for another single
clipped to midwicket
prodded down to third man
poked back up the track to where the bowler is standing in his followthrough
solid in defence again
pushed on the up, on the back foot, a quick single to cover
down the leg side
good carry as Kieswetter gathers with fingers skyward
solid finish to the over, as the groundstaff hustle some sawdust out to the middle
clipped to square leg but there's no way through
awkward lift from back of a length. Defended slightly airily back down the wicket
pushed wide of the bowler in his followthrough but can't beat mid-on
there's the frustrated whoosh. Full length, nipping away, and Parthiv flings the bat at it. To no avail
driven hard down the ground, and there's India's first boundary. A much more compact stroke from Parthiv and he reaps his rewards
flicked to midwicket
a strangled appeal from Bresnan as this one nips back to strike a combination of pad and glove, as Parthiv props a long way forward
dropped! Poor Ben Stokes' first significant touch of the ball in international cricket is a low spill at backward point. Whoops. That hit the heel of his hands, and never looked like sticking
turned off the toes to square leg
compact drive to mid-off
short, and slotted through midwicket with a swivel-pull. Nicely done
pushed off the back foot to point, where the ball is half-stopped, but that's enough to deter the run.
poked into the gap
good delivery, holding its line outside off, and beating the edge
solidly forward, and pushed to cover
turned off the toes to midwicket, where the ball is easily intercepted
this time, Parthiv's clip finds the gap at midwicket, but is swept up as mid-on rushes round
firmly drilled off the back foot, but straight to extra cover. Some authority in that stroke
good shot, up and over cover. Not quite timed, but beats the infield
banged in short, and Parthiv withdraws the gloves
Parthiv didn't know much about that, but fortunately nor did the fielders. An attempted clip to leg takes a fat outside edge, and loops safely down to third man
into line and defended
well played, a cramped pull off a decent length, gets it very fine and beats fine leg
firmly forward, mid-on gathers
clipped off the pads, in the air, but just short of short midwicket
speedy. Parthiv bails out of a considered pull
round the wicket, defended on the back foot, right in front of the top of off stump
pushed to extra cover
turned off the toes to midwicket
defended on the back foot, a good over
good length on off stump, but an excellent back-foot forcing stroke nearly picks the gap at cover. Well intercepted
on off stump, defended
huge appeal but an inside-edge saves Rahane from a certain lbw! That was full and straight, and tailing in a touch. Good nut
that's a fine riposte from Rahane! Going full again, but the batsman is equal to it, and swings clean through the line for a straight boundary
Broad's turn for a riposte, as Rahane nearly inside-edges with a cramped cut. Good little duel developing
pulled, emphatically, through square leg! Quickly onto the short ball and puts it away well. That's the end of the Powerplay, and India are going okay...
clunked to cover
tip-and-run to Cook at wide mid-on, and a direct hit would have been close ...
round the wicket again to the left-hander, turned to midwicket
firmly into line, and defended to cover
two steps down the wicket and an urgent slap as Anderson drops short in response
short and misdirected, and helped round the corner. Fine leg can't cut that off, and India march on
clipped in the air and over midwicket, a fine stroke to a full-length delivery!
a stifled appeal, but that was zipping over the top of the stumps
blocked down the track
up and over, and belted through extra cover. This is a fine acceleration
turned off the toes to midwicket
calmly negotiated. Impressive signs from Rahane
round the wicket again, tight line demands a compact stroke
driven into the covers and a good juggling stop from Bresnan
very cunning stuff from Parthiv! A short ball, and he sways out of line to ramp the ball up and over the slips
same region, same result! England are leaking a lot of runs behind square today. Parthiv just opened the face on that one
clips the pads and they scamper through
defended into the covers, another solid over's work from India's openers
full and straight
worked behind square
fully forward and blocked
firmly struck, clean down the ground, but well gathered with a tumble at mid-off
pushed firmly to short cover, but no way through
full length, and respectfully defended
cracking strike! Outside off, back of a length, and he just wellied it on the up over wide long-on. Shabash
on the pads, turned fine
blocked out to point. One of the many slow variations, as Rahane waited on his stroke
short, and sweetly pulled! Dernbach's short ball was instantly picked, and leathered through square leg!
blocked out to short midwicket. An expensive introduction to the match for Dernbach
back of a length, defended into the off side
slower ball on the stumps, worked behind square on the leg side
down the leg side but he gets away with the wide call...pretty tight, a tad lucky I think
short again, this pull doesn't come out of the middle but a fumble at deep square-leg means they make a second
ooh...Parthiv was struggling with that run, he jabbed a very full delivery towards cover and if Anderson had managed to field cleanly it was a clear run out chance
gone! England find the breakthrough and it's with the short ball. Goes for another pull, this time it comes off the top edge and Samit Patel swallows a comfortable catch at fine leg
on off stump, Dravid defends into the off side as he did for so long in the Test series
good ball, nips back into Dravid and it takes an inside edge that then bobbles into the backward point area
punched down to mid-on
opens the face and guides down to third man
flicked backward of square into the leg side
another slower ball from Dernbach, comes out short and Parthiv waits for it before pulling to long leg along the ground
almost a problem with the run as Parthiv drops it towards backward point then hesistates, but Dravid is able to get through safely enough
defended into the off side
goes for the pull but doesn't connect cleanly and it rolls to midwicket

Big appeal for caught behind and England review as it's given not out by Doctrove. Nothing on Hotspot by the looks of things. Broad was convinced and signalled for the DRS himself. There has been plenty of DRS controversy in recent times. Don't think they can overturn this. No clear evidence, but they have done! He's been given. I can't work that out. Oh boy, this could rumble on
no surprise, gets a short one first up and ducks underneath
opens the face to third man to get off the mark
defended solidly to cover
behind the line again
worked into the leg side
taken from around middle and off, worked down to fine leg
inside edge into the pad which lands down by Kohli's feet
ends a tight over from Dernbach
back of a length, punched firmly to backward point
onto the front foot and defended solidly into the off side
good bouncer, Parthiv went for the pull but was beaten for pace
another play and miss, this time he tries to guide it to third man
almost another wicket for the short ball, this pull doesn't come out of the middle and the top edge lands just short of Eoin Morgan at deep midwicket
defended to the on side
worked away into one of the gaps
short of a length, moves across the crease and flicks out to deep square
goes back and defends
picks up another short ball and dispatches between fine leg and deep square leg although still a hint of top edge
now opens the face to third man and reaches his fifty from 66 balls
punched back to the bowler and Dernbach then hits the stumps as he hurls a throw from his follow through
round the wicket, pushed to cover
defended with bat and pad together
goes back to one that doesn't turn, almost gets into a tangle but places into the off side
lovely shot as he guides it very fine past the wicketkeeper with a delicate open face
worked away, milking the spinner's first over
pushed back to the bowler
worked off the hip out to deep square
takes the pad backward of square
short ball, Kohli hops back and rolls the wrists to find space in the leg side
goes for a pull but is too early on the shot and gets beaten
a slower-ball bouncer, tries to open the face to third man but doesn't make contact
clipped through midwicket
driven down to long off
pushed down the ground
excellent work from Bell at backward point to cut off a powerful cut
goes in the air down the ground, but doesn't come off the middle and it lobs into the outfield
opens the face and finds the gap to deep cover
can't find the gap this time
full on off stump, defended down to mid-on
a slower-bouncer, Kohli waits nicely and pulls to fine leg
a conventional short ball this time which is powerful pulled away and goes one bounce to deep square
pushed into the covers
tried to take this from off stump into the leg side but can't beat midwicket
defended to cover as we reach the half-way point of the innings
worked into the gap at midwicket
continues to ease the spinner around with a single down the ground
pushed back to the bowler
whipped through the leg side out to deep midwicket
tries to work into the leg side but takes the pad into the off side
done for a lack of pace, he saw it short, went for the pull but was through his shot and was taken on the stomach
nicely played, flicked strongly over midwicket and finds the gap which means deep square-leg has to do the fielding
worked neatly off the pads to deep square
angled into the right hander which allows him to pick space on the leg side
well played, not every pull he's played has been convincing but this one was as he latches on and sends it in front of square
repeats the dose, not clever bowler from Bresnan and this one also beats deep square...excellent over for India
remembers to pitch it up this time and is punched to mid-on
very full and dug out to cover
defended into midwicket
driven very hard off the back foot but excellent fielding at cover by Morgan who gets at least two high-fives for his efforts
good stuff from Patel, cramps Kohli for room as he tries to find a gap into the off side
yorker-length again and can only be driven down the ground
ooh, nearly for Patel...Parthiv rocks back and lofts over the man at cover
that's dismissive from Kohli, he gets a back-of-a-length delivery and pulls it powerfully over straight midwicket
good reply from Dernbach, pitches it up a touch more around off stump and Kohli is beaten
worked away through square leg
flicked away off leg stump, it races towards the boundary but Samit Patel makes good ground to cut off the boundary
third man has been a productive area and again Parthiv opens the face
slower ball on off stump, Kohli plays with a turn of the wrists into the leg side
pushed down to long off
comes across the stumps and whips down the ground
perhaps an arm ball as it he can't get it away
tucked into the big gap on the leg side
beaten outside off as he goes for the cut
flicked straight to midwicket...Samit doing a decent job today
back-foot drive, straight to cover
slower ball, guided with soft hands to gully, where a clean pick-up might have been close. Stokes fumbles though
chipped, in the air, not the best shot but the placement works a treat. Mid-on can't intercept, and away it rolls
on the pads from round the wicket, worked fine
a bit of a fumble in the pick-up, but it makes no odds
guided with an open face to third man
drilled into the deep
thwacked, with no timing, to short midwicket
now there's the timing! Down on one knee, a full swing of the bat, and that's clean into the gap at deep midwicket
opens the face to run into the gully
loud and optimistic appeal as Parthiv gets well outside the line with an attempted slog-sweep
patted up to mid-on
full and floaty. Patted to mid-on
opens the face to dab down to third man
good delivery, looked like an offcutter, and took an inside-edge to square leg
solid stuff, on the off stump, and patted to mid-on
chiselled into the leg-side, the lack of pace and tight line is a good combination on this track. So far
good aggressive thump to finish the over. A touch short from Trott, and Parthiv was onto it in a flash, clean through midwicket
dabbed to long-off
a hint of turn from outside off. Defended in the air for a split-second
big appeal as Parthiv misses a sweep, and that was close as it struck the back pad. Lucky ...
an exchange of singles to keep the run-rate ticking
flicked out to deep midwicket
too short from Trott, and slashed through point. No margin for error at his pace
width again but fuller, and gets away with it
a hint of swing from outside off, and drilled firmly to short cover
tapped to midwicket and an ambitious second run, a poor throw from Anderson ensures there are no alarms
down the leg-side, a bonus run
hesitation as Patel steams in, but he makes his ground safely
punched to short cover. A mostly decent over from Trott
punched on the up to mid-on
a firm click of willow,  but straight to mid-off
short, slashed, top-edged, safe. No cutting that off at third man
on the toes, clipped square
short and well-directed. Parthiv attempts a jab over the slips but the swing takes the ball out of his reach
attempted chop through the covers, but extra lift from a good length stifles the stroke
nip off the pitch and helped round the corner with a clip off the pads
nurdled to deep square leg to bring up the 100 partnership. Very valuable indeed
blocked on a good length, midwicket cleans up
chipped out to deep midwicket, and they go for a dicey second run, but they are safely home in the end, despite an accurate throw from the deep
straighter, and punched to long-on

that's the wicket! Oh dear, poor Parthiv misses his hundred. Anderson came round the wicket, and a wide delivery was too inviting for a man on 95. A wild drive, a thin snick, and Kieswetter does the rest
dabbed down to long-on
Sharma wears his first ball on the glove, and he's not looking comfortable ... a good lifter, rattled the splice and jammed his index finger. The physio looks as though he's trying to pull it off!
predictably short, but Raina drops his hands to let it pass by
a touch of width and dabbed to third man on the bounce
tucked off the toes to deep midwicket, good running
short and left alone
emphatic! Full and wide, and leathered on one knee, over extra cover. Not sure he'll get many more in that slot ...
full, but straighter and slower, and poked to mid-on
cheekily done, a deliberate snick wide of the keeper. Third man tidies up
tip-and-run outside off, a scampered single to point, and that's Kohli's fifty. Well played
feeding Raina's drive again, but this time there's a sweeper in place at deep cover
short, and pulled firmly to deep midwicket
round the wicket, driven hard back to the bowler
finds the gap at  deep midwicket, just a touch too short
the perfect comeback! Samit pushes his next ball through a touch quicker, Kohli leans back for the cut, but under-edges onto his stumps!
on middle, worked out to midwicket
very full and dug out back to the bowler
takes the bat and pad to short fine-leg, excellent effort from Patel
big appeal! Dhoni has padded up to this one. Broad is convinced it's lbw, but Richard Illingworth says not out and it's the right call. Top umpiring.
top shot, just a hint of width and it allows Dhoni to free his arms with a square drive that races away
a bit of extra bounce, Dhoni adjusts and pushes it square on the off side
good line from Broad and Dhoni defends towards cover
short ball at the body, Dhoni swivels on a pull and long leg comes around to field
a poor piece of fielding third man gives Raina a boundary, it was played with an open face through backward point and Dernbach makes a mess if his sliding attempt to stop it
worked into the leg side
touch shorter, Raina stays on the back foot and punches down the ground
flatter at the stumps, Dhoni plays it back to the bowler
angled into leg stump and flicked through midwicket
comes well forward, opens the face and places it wide of short third man
gives himself a touch of room to drive but picks out cover
massive blow, we saw some of these in Twenty20 as Raina flat-bats a back-of-a-length delivery way over long on
flies in the air down to third man but too fine for backward point
well bowled,  very full at the stumps and dug out towards mid-off
a sweetly-timed drive but picks out Stokes at cover
beaten by a short ball which he tried to upper-cut down to third man
good again from Broad, goes full this time and Raina can only jab it into the ground and it bounces towards Kieswetter
tucked to short fine-leg
worked through square leg, they think of a second but it's not on
pushed in very full and Raina jabs down
worked to long on
still just a single as Dhoni works it off the stumps to square leg
driven down to long off
round the wicket, flicked in the air through square leg
thought of about three shots to this ball and ends up getting a leading edge which loops into the leg side
slower ball on the stumps, Dhoni opens the face and takes the single on offer
that's huge! Drifting onto leg stump and Raina flicks it high and handsome over fine leg
good reply, a slower ball that makes Raina play too early and it takes the pad
another slower one which is full and pushed into the covers
punched back very firmly towards Bresnan who can't stop it in his follow through
good delivery, full at the stumps and it's squeezed into the leg side
a well-controlled pull out to deep square-leg
beaten by a slower short ball which he tries to glide down to third man
comes out as a low full toss but Raina can only clip it out to deep midwicket
good over from Bresnan as this full delivery only costs a single to long off
left alone outside off, that's fairly unusual for the 47th over of a one-day innings
low full toss is driven firmly down the ground and straight enough to mean long off can't stop the second
a slower ball comes out very short but Dhoni doesn't latch on and it bobbles towards short fine-leg
round the wicket, worked away through square leg
excellent yorker, Dhoni's inside edge goes straight to square leg and he has to scamper back quickly
pulled out to deep midwicket...a good Powerplay over for the bowling side
good bouncer, that was sharp from Bresnan and it beats Dhoni's hook shot
he connects with this one, heaves it through square leg and splits the deep fielders
now he flat-bats a pull down to long on...he was aiming that more through midwicket
super yorker, Raina jabs down and an inside scoots past the stumps towards fine leg
good legs from Raina as he scampers back for a second having worked this into the leg side
beat outside off as tries to place this down to third man
dragged down short, pulled wide of long on which allows him back for a second
width outside off but it's slapped to cover

the slower ball gets another wicket, this one was short and Raina just helped it into the hands of short fine-leg...Dernbach completely did the batsman. Good knock, though, from Raina who ensured India didn't lose direction
jumps towards leg stump but manages to angle the ball into the point area
another slower one which is short, Dhoni plays it along the ground through square leg and the sweeper does well to stop the boundary
good to finish with, drilled down to long on
full and wide, Dhoni bunts it to cover and doesn't try for a run
low full toss is swung hard down the ground and a poor throw means the two is completed
big swing from Dhoni results in a thin edge through to the keeper...a curious innings by the captain who never really got going, but he always had to be aware of a fairly long tail
now he's on a hat-trick...full and straight at off stump, the batsman gave himself some room and didn't make contact. Good stuff from Bresnan, England taking momentum into the break
went full but Kumar manages to drive down to long-on
short of a length, angled away to backward point and that's a super finish from Bresnan

inn2.comm: short of length ball that swerves away from the left-hander, gets the outside edge but was wide of second slip
a more confident shot from Cook this time, getting forward to a fuller delivery and defending towards cover
pushes this one in front of point
India think about an lbw appeal as Praveen gets one back in towards Cook after getting the first three to move away, there is a big inside-edge though
good start by Praveen, this ball is on a length and is pushed back towards the bowler
third time in the over that he has got the edge, off the outside edge this time as Cook looks to defend the ball, flies in the direction of backward point
he starts with a length ball that is clipped towards square leg for a couple
the edges continues, a length ball around off that Kieswetter was looking to work to leg, ends up flying in front of front
watchful from Kieswetter, slightly shorter from Vinay and around off stump, blocked down the track
on middle and off this time from Vinay, similar response from Kieswetter, carefully defending towards the bowler
on a length and heading for middle, Kieswetter nudges it towards midwicket
good over from Vinay, more defence from Kieswetter to end it
Cook gets well forward and defends a length delivery in front of point
very close to offstump, Cook moves away from the stumps and slaps the ball towards backward point
it is on middle stump this time, but Cook again wants to play it to the off side, squeezes it towards backward point
Cook succumbs to an incutter, he again tries to force a ball close to the stumps in the direction of point, once again Praveen induces the edge, this time the ball rolls on to the stumps
Trott defends the final ball of the over to the off side
in the channel just outside off and that is left alone
keeps the ball around off, solidly defended off the front foot
a little bit wider than the previous one, Kieswetter leans forward and defends to the off side
a bit shorter from Vinay and that bounces much more than Kieswetter expects, he is struck on the gloves as he looks to play that off the front foot, the bottom hand immediately comes off the bat
fuller and on leg stump this time, flicked towards midwicket
Vinay completes a maiden, again testing the batsman around off stump, defended to the off side
just back of a length and around off stump, Trott shuffles across and tucks the ball towards midwicket
Trott gets off the mark by guiding a short of length ball that is wide of off towards third man
gets the ball to duck away from the batsman after pitching outside off, Kieswetter shoulders arms
this one comes in a touch, Kieswetter not having the best of times, he looks to defend back towards the bowler, off the inside-edge to his boot
length ball on middle and leg, Kieswetter moves across and guides it down to fine leg for an easy boundary
beauty from Praveen to end the over, Kieswetter doesn't seem too confident over which way the ball is moving, ends up playing well inside the line of a short of length ball that swerved away from him
shot! a length ball outside off , Troot gets well forward and square drives that elegantly past point for four
a good piece of fielding from Raina at cover, diving to his left to save an on-the-up cover drive  from Trott
nobody is stopping that one, another on-the-up front foot drive through cover, pierces the gap this time
Trott pushes this one towards mid-off
again Trott gets forward to a back of length ball, eases it wide of mid-off for a single
short of length again, close to off stump, solid defence towards cover
defended towards the off side from the crease
more defence from Trott, this time towards point
a big appeal for lbw, to a short of length ball that strikes Trott in the line of off stump, but very high on the pad, that would have sailed over
fuller length and angled in, Kieswetter pushes it to mid-on

Kieswetter's troubled stay is over, he is stuck on the crease as he looks to play a back of a length delivery towards midwicket, he misses and is struck on the pad, that was going on to take middle stump, Praveen's impressive England tour continues
short of length ball outside off guided behind point, where a fumble from Kohli allows a couple
beautiful drive from Trott, short of length ball and a bit of width on offer, Trott gets nicely forward and unleashes another elegant drive, this time past extra cover for four
almost played on, a thick inside-edge to an incutter from Vinay
